body_html:
I just checked, using pretrained with aux_logits=False is also not possible. To use the pretrained model, you have to use

inception = models.inception_v3(pretrained=True, num_classes=1000, aux_logits=True)

After that it works and I am can't reproduce the error with same config (pt0.3.1, tv0.2.0)
body_text:
I just checked, using pretrained with aux_logits=False is also not possible. To use the pretrained model, you have to use
inception = models.inception_v3(pretrained=True, num_classes=1000, aux_logits=True)
After that it works and I am can't reproduce the error with same config (pt0.3.1, tv0.2.0)
body:
I just checked, using pretrained with `aux_logits=False` is also not possible. To use the pretrained model, you have to use
```python
inception = models.inception_v3(pretrained=True, num_classes=1000, aux_logits=True)
```
After that it works and I am can't reproduce the error with same config (pt0.3.1, tv0.2.0)
